hadiths.text: Narrated `Abdullah bin `Umar:The Prophet (ﷺ) ordered (Muslims) to give one Sa' of dates or one Sa' of barley as Zakat-ul-Fitr. The people rewarded two Mudds of wheat as equal to that

chapter.ara-name: باب صَدَقَةِ الْفِطْرِ صَاعًا مِنْ تَمْرٍ
chapter.eng-name: Sadaqat-ul-Fitr is one Sa' of dates (per head)
